markdown:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [I see an error - “Your device is jailbroken or rooted.” How can I log in?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38909055927577-I-see-an-error-Your-device-is-jailbroken-or-rooted-How-can-I-log-in)

[See more](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/38904293949721-Logging-in-to-GCash)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If you can’t log in to GCash, it’s because of the GCash app’s new security features, one of which stops unauthorized access to accounts on modified or unsafe devices.

You might see this prompt because of reasons such as:

- The system detected that your [device could be jailbroken or rooted](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38909055927577-I-see-an-error-Your-device-is-jailbroken-or-rooted-How-can-I-log-in)
- The system detected that your [settings allow installation via untrusted sources or developer options](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38909344986393-I-see-an-error-Your-device-has-modified-phone-settings-How-can-I-log-in)
- There could have been [applications installed that made your device not secure](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38910492949529).

To protect your account, you cannot access GCash on the device that experienced this error. To use GCash, open the GCash app through a secure and unmodified mobile phone or tablet device.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [I can't log in to my GCash account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900006273543)

- [How to troubleshoot GCash app issues](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38910877046937)
